description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Steak, Nectarine & Asparagus Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: BBQ Steak, Nectarine & Asparagus Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g porterhouse steaks with herb & garlic butter

recipeInstructions.text: Slice steaks. Add to salad with nectarine and asparagus. From the salad kit, drizzle over dressing and top with feta and walnuts.
